data.text:
This page is automatically recreated from time to time. Accordingly, any changes you make here will be overwitten. See below for details. Last full update was August 2008.

There are too many articles in this project to list them all on one page. This article contains the first 6000 articles and links to other articles which contain links to all articles, categories, images, portal pages templates, and project pages with {{WP India}} on their talk page. It was generated by Ganeshbot. Its purpose is to be able to track the project history using related changes or related watchlist which only shows the last change for each article.
